import math
while 1:
    p = 1
    count = 0
    n,m = map(int,raw_input('').split())
    if n==0 and m==0:
        break
    while 1:
        val = ((1/math.sqrt(5))*math.pow(1.61803,p))
        if ((val-math.floor(val))<0.5):
            val = int(math.floor(val))
        else:
            val = int(math.ceil(val))
        if val>m:
            break
        if val>=n:
            count = count + 1        
        p = p+1
    print count
